room_title: Escape room "The Haunting of Hyde House" by Backstage Escape Games in Myrtle Beach
review: Amazing and very clever clues, the kids and us all had a great time. We were just seconds away from finishing. So close. This was our 3rd year in a row, trying a new room each year. All are so good and highly recommended. Itâ€™s one of our favorite attractions every year. Already looking forward to next years visit.
